Device.name: Wetlabs ECO-BB2F Fluorometer
Device.description: Wetlabs ECO FL fluorometer on UW test deployment at Seahurst

RecordVariable.name: Date_1
RecordVariable.description: date in dd/mm/yy format of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Time_1
RecordVariable.description: time of day in hh:mm:ss format of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: BlueRef_1
RecordVariable.description: blue reference light signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: BlueSignal_1
RecordVariable.description: blue signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: RedRef_1
RecordVariable.description: red reference light signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: RedSignal_1
RecordVariable.description: red signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Chlorophyll_1
RecordVariable.description: chlorophyll signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: ThermistorTemp_1
RecordVariable.description: thermistor temperature of 1st sample in this record
